mapper.select: select ORDER_NO,ORDER_DATE,MATNR,UNIT,QTY,INCRE_QTY,FLAG,IFNULL(RESEND_QTY,0) RESEND_QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item WHERE 1=1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MATNR ASC
select MAX(ITEM_NO) FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item WHERE 1=1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update t_ssm_req_goods_order_item
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCRE_QTY = #{increQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESEND_QTY = #{resendQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MATNR = #{oldMatnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT i.*, ex.WERKS WERKS, ex.RESLO RESLO, m.BASE_UNIT BASE_UNIT, i.INCRE_QTY + i.QTY SUM_QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (i.INCRE_QTY+i.QTY) > 0 JOIN t_md_branch b ON b.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO JOIN t_md_mara m ON m.MATNR = i.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = b.SALES_ORG JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex ON m.MATNR = ex.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG
